name: Army Base Shooting 3D
description: Lets play one of the best and unique Army base shooting 3D action game where you will find modern army commando equipping with the latest new sniper shooting rifles aiming at the provided targets. Frontline commando have responsibilities to save the resident's life as well war with enemies. Destroy enemy camps with powerful sniper weapons and complete enemy killing.This is a gun shooting based game for fans of hot shooting with stylized graphics and realistic thrilling environments. This action game is here for your great enjoyment and entertainment time. You can also feel the real amazing weapon shooting effective sound on this  Army base shooting 3D  fight mission simulated.
